title: Restore About section on homepage by re-rendering existing component

requirements.summary: Re-render the existing About section component on the homepage exactly as it previously existed, without modifying any About content or styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The homepage once again contains the About section (the section with id="about") rendered from the existing About component.
No text changes occur anywhere inside the restored About section (including headings, paragraphs, and feature-card copy).
No design/layout/styling changes occur to the About section compared to the prior version (same structure, spacing, typography, and UI elements).
No additional sections, copy, or “optimized”/rewritten content is introduced as part of this change.

file_operations.description: Restore the homepage About section by importing the existing `frontend/src/components/About.tsx` component and rendering it back within the homepage composition (placing it in the same position it previously occupied). Do not modify the About component itself or any of its content/styling; only re-add its render on the homepage.
